name: Most Memorable Maid
description:
The automated cleaning crew keeps incinerating precious artifacts! It's your job to stop them.

Observe the robots and when one of them picks up an object remember how they looked, and tell the control system to retrieve the item from them. Make sure the robot's specs are all identical! Or your Performance Score will suffer, which could result in Termination.

This started as an entry for the Idle Thumbs Wizard Jam 4. I since then added a tutorial, the option to select a difficulty and a lot of polish.

I kept the jam version uploaded here so you can check that out too if you want.
